column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our waiter was terrible. When my boyfriend had asked about the birthday special
column2: he straight up said NO with a stern
column3: unfriendly face. WOW. Since he didn't take our order
column5: he asked what we wanted to drink
column6: we just wanted ice water. He took 15-20 minutes to bring us two cups of water. By that time
column7: our pizza was almost ready and another waiter brought us our pizza and utensils because somehow we had been waiting and did not even receive the proper utensils. The other waiter served our pizzas and left. The pizza was good
column8: the crust was buttery and crunchy with nice layers of cheese
column10: toppings. One of the freshest I've ever had.
